actions.committee: Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs
actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs.

committees.committee: Senate Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

official_title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate that, upon the establishment of, or enactment of legislation creating, a public health care plan, Members of Congress shall lose access to the Federal Employees Health Benefits Plan and shall be required to enroll in the public plan.
subjects: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Senate that upon the establishment or enactment of legislation creating a public health care plan, Members of Congress should lose access to the Federal Employees Health Benefits Plan and shall be required to enroll in such public plan.

titles.title: A resolution expressing the sense of the Senate that, upon the establishment of, or enactment of legislation creating, a public health care plan, Members of Congress shall lose access to the Federal Employees Health Benefits Plan and shall be required to enroll in the public plan.
